title: soul of the river of the yellow
description: themed study of the art and the man

post.title: man and manage
post.body:
there is sure relation between the two words, and acts.

this is a chance to talk to ed, about the navy accident, also about the art business.

post.title: man's many different kind of journey, this is one
the epic, and the man and his journey along the river of the yellow
two main entities
post.body:
1. the painting - the most detailed, most beautiful, from every of its details leads to the world;
2. and everything else with sole function of supporting the painting, these should be highly symbolic to simplify the whole design process, it is not possible to put too much effort into this, and in this situation the symbolic approach may serve even better. think of the minecraft design, the picasson cubicsim, can be used here;

post.title: the game design
post.body:
if we can set it all up within a month, then that is a worthwhile effort for making this a dedicated long term venture. 

it trades not just this one time. it has taken on a whole independent life on itsown.

game design:
- allow and encourage more gamers to participate
- somple game logic so it is easy to set up
- variations rich
- center of the game is clear the yellow river
- combine the western master piece of literature with that of the orient

post.title: let it be the inspiration...and build from it an empire - the river of the yellow
post.body: a whole new enterprise, starting the build out today.

post.title: master cai the man
post.body:
yes he is the man, the creator of the art. why not. 

he has done his part. let's do our part. 

together, we make the journey complete, and start a new journey again.

post.body:

history

post.title: the total art
post.body:
themes 
- the river of the yellow
- its history 
- the man
- the chinese 
- the man and his soul

post.title: the art
post.body:
it cristalizes out of the river ofthe yellow, and the man. 

man lives along it, it nurishes man, it is that simple. 

man has soul. so does the river of the yellow. 

today we do not know the people before. today we only has this one peice before us. 

we have to retrace it back in time, and learn about the man.

from it, we hope to see the future.

post.title: why?
post.body:
it all starts from this river, the river of the yellow. 

it has existed for billions of years on earth.

slowly over time, human appears along it, from a few, to ultimately billions today. 

human believers he has soul. 

the river, the man, the soul.
